    • isSlotBooked

      public boolean isSlotBooked(String slotId, String gymId)
      Checks if the slot is already booked or not
      Parameters:
      slotId - the slot id for which the booking status is requested
      Returns:
      returns true if the slot id for the given date is fully booked else returns false

    • hasBookedSlotAlready

      public boolean hasBookedSlotAlready(String slotId, String customerEmail)
      Checks if the customer has already booked a seat in the same slot for the given date
      Specified by:
      hasBookedSlotAlready in interface CustomerServiceInterface
      Parameters:
      slotId - the slot id for which the booking status is requested
      customerEmail - the email of customer for which the booking status is getting checked
      Returns:
      returns true if the customer has already booked a seat on the same date in the same slot
